values.value: select id, name,Value_for_pipeline__c from COpportunity__c where Customer__c =: AccId and status__c in ('Approved', 'Make Quotation ready for submitial','Quote Ready for Submital','Quote Submitted to Customer','Customer Contacted for Submitted quote','Quotation under clarification with Customer') and Business_Unit__c not in ('Aberdeen','Barton') order by Value_for_pipeline__c desc limit 10
